result.title: Otis Delivers Vertical Mobility for Montreal's REM Light Metro Transit
result.text: Customized elevator and escalator solutions designed to deliver safe and reliable access to this one-of-a-kind driverless transit system MONTREAL , Dec. 22, 2025 /PRNewswire/ --Otis (NYSE: OTIS), the world's leading elevator and escalator manufacturing, installation and service company, has completed a landmark installation at the Rseau Express Mtropolitain (REM) light metro transit in Montral. This transformative project was designed to connect communities across Greater Montral and offer safe, reliable and accessible transportation across the city.

result.title: Headwinds Can't Ground This Elevator Giant: Why I'm Still Bullish On Otis
result.text: Otis Worldwide (OTIS) delivered a Q3 earnings beat, raising full-year EPS guidance despite ongoing headwinds, particularly in China. OTIS faces declining New Equipment sales and profits, but strong Services segment growth and cost-saving measures help offset challenges. Share repurchases, a healthy balance sheet, and strategic global projects support long-term bullishness, though near-term upside is limited.

result.title: Otis Worldwide: Visible Path To Earnings Acceleration Ahead
result.text: Otis Worldwide Corporation is upgraded to Buy as the long-awaited inflection point has arrived, with service growth and margins accelerating. Service segment organic sales grew 6% y/y, driving margin expansion despite modernization mix headwinds, signaling improved productivity and pricing power for OTIS. Americas New Equipment business is stabilizing, China is showing signs of bottoming, and a robust backlog provides strong visibility into 2026 earnings.

result.text: The headline numbers for Otis Worldwide (OTIS) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended September 2025, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

result.title: Otis Worldwide (OTIS) Beats Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
result.text: Otis Worldwide (OTIS) came out with quarterly earnings of $1.05 per share, beating the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1 per share. This compares to earnings of $0.96 per share a year ago.

result.title: OTIS REPORTS THIRD QUARTER 2025 RESULTS
result.text: Otis delivers 6% organic Service sales growth with strong Service operating profit margin expansion, and increases the midpoint of 2025 EPS outlook Third quarter 2025 Net sales up 4% and organic sales up 2%, driven by Service net sales up 9% with organic sales up 6% Service operating profit margin up 70bps GAAP EPS down 29% and adjusted EPS up 9% Maintenance portfolio units up 4% Modernization orders up 27% at constant currency, backlog up 22% New Equipment orders up 4% at constant currency, up 7% excluding China Year-to-date 2025 Service net sales up 6% with organic sales up 5% Service operating profit margin up 40bps GAAP EPS down 21% and adjusted EPS up 4% Operating cash flow of $779 million; adjusted free cash flow of $766 million Share repurchases of approximately $800 million FARMINGTON, Conn. , Oct. 29, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Otis Worldwide Corporation (NYSE:OTIS) reported third quarter 2025 net sales of $3.7 billion with organic sales up 2% versus the prior year.

result.title: Otis Powers Vertical Mobility in My Home Group's Hyderabad Ultra Luxury Projects
result.text: - Provides 169 cutting-edge elevator systems, supporting smarter & smoother living - Continues long customer relationship in reshaping luxury residential landscape HYDERABAD, India , Oct. 15, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Otis India, a subsidiary of Otis Worldwide Corporation(NYSE: OTIS), theglobal leaderin the manufacture, installation, and servicing of elevators and escalators, has secured a major deal with My Home Group to provide next-generation elevator solutions for three of their luxury residential developments in Hyderabad. Otis India will supply 169 high-speed elevator systems engineered for performance, reliability, and premium ride experience for: My Home 99 (rising to 234 meters) My HomeAkrida (12 towers) My HomeGrava Residences (seven towers, one rising to over 54 stories) "Seamless vertical mobility is at the heart of what our customers want to provide for modern urban living.

result.title: SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Purcell & Lefkowitz LLP Announces Shareholder Investigation of Otis Worldwide Corporation (NYSE: OTIS)
result.text: NEW YORK , Oct. 9, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Purcell & Lefkowitz LLP announces that it is investigating Otis Worldwide Corporation (NYSE: OTIS) on behalf of the company's shareholders. The investigation seeks to determine whether Otis Worldwide Corporation's directors breached their fiduciary duties in connection with recent corporate actions.
